payload.description: Update all block components (VideoBlock.jsx, DocumentBlock.jsx, LinkBlock.jsx, TextBlock.jsx) to ensure min-h-[44px] min-w-[44px] on all interactive elements. Replace hover-only patterns with always-visible or responsive patterns (visible on mobile, hover on desktop). Update touch target sizes.

Add sm:opacity-0 sm:group-hover:opacity-100 pattern (always visible on mobile <640px, hover on desktop). Ensure all clickable areas meet WCAG touch target requirements.
